text_content: When order book depth drops 50% but price holds, market makers are pulling liquidity expecting a big move. Prepare accordingly. $PAXG  $PEPE    Free AI signals with +70% winrate → finorabot.com

Tokenized Gold Market Update 

Tokenized Gold market capitalization has exceeded $4B, as spot gold trades near $4,986/oz.  $XAUt (~$2.5B) and  $PAXG (~$1.99B) together account for roughly 86% of the tokenized commodities market, with strong recent trading volumes.

Data from RWA.xyz shows total tokenized commodities near $4.88B, up about 22% over 30 days, with monthly transfer volume above $7B. In derivatives markets, GOLD-USDC perpetuals recorded around $76M in 24-hour volume.

Goldman Sachs has raised its year-end gold forecast to $5,400/oz.

$PAXG : Expanding Global Financial Integration  $PAXG  expanding its reach across chains confirms the thirst for reliable collateral, but I am looking past the asset itself. Real institutional finance requires a secure, energy-efficient backbone, which is exactly why $ADA  remains my conviction play.  While PAXG acts as a bridge for value, ADA provides the scalable infrastructure and governance models necessary to support these global financial applications long-term. A gold token is useful, but the blockchain built for sovereign finance is essential. Cardano is simply building the bedrock for this entire ecosystem.  #DeFi  #Macro Insights#
